item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, January 22, 2025 at 1:20 PM UTC
item.description:

3. Stargate Project: SoftBank, OpenAI, Oracle, MGX to build data centers (733 points | 846 comments)

25. Prime numbers so memorable that people hunt for them (152 points | 79 comments)

27. Ask HN: Is anyone doing anything cool with tiny language models? (454 points | 227 comments)

29. Usenet is a worldwide distributed electronic bulletin board system (5 points | discuss)
